abstract: Stocks dip slightly amid dropoff in oil and commodity prices; decline marks potential end to five weeks of aggregate gains.
lead_paragraph: Several companies, like Nike and Red Hat, were also dropping after reporting disappointing results or outlooks.

headline.main: Declines in Energy and Mining Shares Drive the Market Lower
headline.print_headline: Energy and Mining Shares Drag on Market

snippet: Several companies, like Nike and Red Hat, were also dropping after reporting disappointing results or outlooks.
